text:
="preserve">Radhika Ranjan Pramanick (18 December 1932 – 13 December 2020) was an Indian politician. He was born in West Bengal, British India. Pramanick was a member of the All India Trinamool Congress. From 1989 to 2004, he was a member of the Lok Sabha.
Pramanick died on 13 December 2020 in Kolkata, India at the age of 87.
